name: Of Bird and Cage
description:
Of Bird And Cage is an Action-Adventure Music Video Game! A first of a kind music album that is experienced entirely through a video game featuring artists from (ex) Guns N' Roses, Epica, Within Temptation, (ex) Evanescence and many others!
Based on 'The Beauty and the Beast', you play as Gitta, a beautiful young girl who tries to escape from the ever-changing prison of her capture - Bres. Will you be able to run away?
The game is a full-length Symphonic-Metal music album that is experiencing fully as an action-adventure video-game. Imagine a video-clip, where you're playing the main character, and you're able to interact with a world that is in perfect sync to the music and shape its story with your actions.
List all of the bands that are playing on the album:
Ron "Bumblefoot" Thal (ex-Guns N Roses)Rob van der Loo (Epica)Ruud Jolie (Within Temptation)Casey Grillo (Kamelot)Rocky Grey (ex-Evanescence)John Lecompt (ex-Evanescence)Mike Lepond (Symphony X)Arjen Lucassen (Ayreon)Tina Guo (Call of Duty: Black Ops II, X-Men: First Class, Journey, Inception)
We are currently in the midst of development. We plan on taking our vision to the next level, and we're hoping to make it as good as possible with the help of the Steam community!
